enableUdp.description: Is udp enabled? If not, the server will only use TCP

krunchIterations.description: Sets number of iterations per sub-steps used by Krunch

lodDetail.description: The detail of the collision LOD of ships, higher values are more detailed but heavier to compute. Setting this to 0 disables Lod, but may cause instability!

maxDePenetrationSpeed.description: Limit the max collision de-penetration speed so that rigid bodies don't go flying apart when they overlap

physicsSpeed.description: How fast the physics is running. 1.0 is full speed, 0.5 is 50% speed, etc.

physicsSubSteps.description: Sets number of sub-steps used by Krunch

positionIterations.description: The maximum number of iterations used by the PhysX to resolve positions. Higher values are more accurate but heavier to compute

velocityIterations.description: The maximum number of iterations used by PhysX to resolve velocity. Higher values are more accurate but heavier to compute

physics.description: All related settings to the physics engine

synchronizePhysics.description: Synchronize the physics thread and the game thread

terrainBakingThreadPriority.description: Thread priority of terrain baking threads. 5 is default priority, higher is higher priority, lower is lower priority.

terrainBakingThreads.description: Number of terrain baking threads, more is good for preventing stutters when flying fast ships. However, too many will overload the cpu which will lag the game.

terrainDeletionThreadPriority.description: Thread priority of terrain deletion threads. These are used to clean up memory, so they can be lower priority than.

terrainDeletionThreads.description: Number of terrain deletion threads. Typically just 1 is fine.

enableBlockCornerConnectivity.description: Enable/Disable Block Corner Connectivity (WARNING! May significantly increase memory usage)

enableBlockEdgeConnectivity.description: Enable/Disable Block Edge Connectivity (WARNING! May significantly increase memory usage)

enableConnectivity.description: Enable/Disable Connectivity (May reduce memory usage. Use [enableSplitting] instead if you just want to disable ship splitting.)

enableSplitting.description: Enable/Disable Splitting (Disabling this setting will not prevent the use of Air Pockets.)

verboseConnectivityLogging.description: Enable verbose logging of connectivity (May result in very large log files)

udpPort.description: Port to attempt to establish UDP connections on
